# docker_hub_repository (Resource)

Manages Docker Hub repositories.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The repository name.
- `namespace` (String) The Docker Hub namespace (username or organization name).

### Optional

- `description` (String) Short description of the repository (max 100 characters).
- `full_description` (String) Full description of the repository (markdown supported).
- `private` (Boolean) Whether the repository is private. Default is false.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource (namespace/name).
- `pull_count` (Number) Number of pulls for this repository.
- `star_count` (Number) Number of stars for this repository.
